timeline.message: Allow direct-insert bucket file pattern in testBucketingVersion

timeline.bodyText:
Disable transactional tables in testBucketingVersion

distrubutions -> distributions
timeline.author: findepi

timeline.message:
Disable transactional tables in testBucketingVersion

Explicitly disable transactional flag for table created in testBucketingVersion.
Othewise insert-via-presto flow fails on distributions which create
transactional tables by default.

Transaction tables coverage is provided via TestHiveTransactionalTable.
